name: Vege Snake ST
description:
Note : USE LANSCAPE MODE BEFORE YOU RUN THE GAME TO PLAY EASIER , if the landscape mode didn't work then you have to on the landscape mode and click the full screen button and don't forget to rotate your phone! Wait few seconds until the screen become lanscape then you can play.

Vege Snake ST is a game where you play as snake , you have to eat as much as you can to collect score. Use arrow to control or use the button in the screen!

The snake's color was rainbow! The snake's head has around 20 colors

There have 5 fruit:

Apple = 10 points

Orange = 10 points

Banana = 10 points

Strawberry = 15 point

Watermelon = 15 points

Good luck! and Thanks for playing!
